title: Patient Lounge | Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
description: Visit the Integrative Medical Institute Patient Lounge to set appointments, download forms, read frequently asked questions and much more.
sitename: Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
cleaned_text: Patients & Visitor Information Welcome to the the Integrative Medical Institute (IMI) patient portal. You will find IMI resources and gain access to useful information here. If you are experiencing a medical emergency please call 911 immediately. Where we are located Integrative Medical Institute Of Orange County 1440 East Chapman Fri: 9 AM-1 PM Sat & Sun: Closed
